transcripts.text: Shalom to Rabbi Azariah Ariel from the research center of the Makon HaMikdash.  We saw in the picture the red cows that the machine operated to find.  Are they still related as red cows?

The two cows that were born are about a year old.  Their general appearance is red, brown.  They have a group of hairs that are not red enough in between.  But the Rav Tan says that there is a good chance that in the coming months this hair will also be red and then they will be completely ready.
At what age will they be ready for the shechitah and the preparation of the Efer?  God willing, in another year.

Is the holy machine ready and able to perform the process of preparing the Efer according to all the legal rules?  We are in the midst of preparations, both the legal and the practical ones.  We very much hope that by the name of G-d, when it becomes clear that the laws are completely binding, we will also receive more public assistance and we will be able to carry out this mitzvah for the whole of the Jewish people.  Is there a machine in the G-d that also prepares priests who can, as teachers, who can fulfill the mitzvah at all stages?

We have knowledge of how many priests that are related to the issue.  We really need more priests.  If anyone knows of any theoretical priests who were born in Israel and were never in a hospital, we would be happy for them to come to us.  Is it necessary to go to a certain place for the burial and preparation of the grave?  If so, where?  Thank you very much to Rabbi Azaria from Mechon Mechkas near Mechon Mekdash.  Thank you very much to you too.
